rows.label: qev019401_MSG0001
rows.name:
Guess what, [ST:playername ]? I finally
finished analyzing the data units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0002
rows.name:
And honestly, I never dreamed my old team would
cook up something this crazy...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0003
rows.name:
Their research was a secret to the former heads, and
I expect they never told me because it had possible...
implications for my career.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0004
rows.name:
Still stings to have been left out of a project this juicy.
It must have been a blast.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0005
rows.name:
Anyway, I'm planning to pick up where they left off
so I can see this through to implementation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kirsty what she found in the data.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0020
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0021
rows.name: Cheer Kirsty on in her endeavor.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, would you listen to me? I'm sorry. I still haven't
explained what this next-generation FrontierNav actually
entails, have I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0007
rows.name: Thank you! ...Oh, but listen to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0008
rows.name:
I still haven't explained what this second-generation
FrontierNav actually IS, have I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0009
rows.name:
But you have to promise you won't laugh, okay?
Because the scope of this project is...aggressive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0010
rows.name:
The aim is to link every planet in the universe to
FrontierNav, sharing information and resources freely
among them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0011
rows.name:
Their schematic starts with the planets of our original
solar system, and proposes linking to newly discovered
planets from there—including Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0012
rows.name:
I have to say, I still can't picture a bunch of elite
scientists coming up with something so...fanciful.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0013
rows.name:
But I still think it's wonderful. A system like this could
literally bring all of space together as one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0030
rows.name: Support

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0031
rows.name: Encourage Kirsty to keep dreaming big.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0040
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0041
rows.name: Tell Kirsty the entire plan sounds absurd.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0014
rows.name:
I knew you'd feel that way. You've got a screw loose
someplace—and I mean that in the most complimentary
sense possible.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh, I know. But so did every major technological
advance until the day someone made it happen.
Big ideas are always crazy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0016
rows.name:
And I'm going to make this project happen, no matter
what it takes, and no matter how long.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0017
rows.name:
It may take 20 years, it may take 10 times that.
But I'm planting that seed today, and I plan to spend
my life tending it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0018
rows.name:
So I'd like to ask your help in gathering the massive
supply of miranium and arc sand ore it will require.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0019
rows.name:
I want you to be my partner in this crazy plan.
What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0020
rows.name:
Thank you. That should be enough to cover an initial
exploratory study.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0021
rows.name:
Let's link new worlds to FrontierNav,
[ST:playername ]. I know we can do it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0022
rows.name:
I suspected my old teammates were up to something,
but this...? I'm still overwhelmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0023
rows.name:
No wonder they didn't report it to our former heads—
they would've been laughed off the Whale! ...Which
means we should lay low until we have something firm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0024
rows.name:
I'm running a deeper analysis on the data from those
archives now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0025
rows.name: I'll leave the miranium and arc sand ore to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0026
rows.name:
Talk about dreaming big... An interstellar FrontierNav
would change everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0027
rows.name:
But even the preliminary research on a project this big
will require a huge amount of miranium.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0028
rows.name:
You're the only one I can rely on, so please let me
know once you have the materials.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0050
rows.name: Deliver

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0051
rows.name: Hand over 20,000 units of miranium.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0060
rows.name: Keep

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0061
rows.name: Hold on to your miranium for now.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0029
rows.name:
Thanks. This should be enough miranium to get us up
and running.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Now the only other thing I need to get my exploratory
study started is the 50 pieces of arc sand ore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0031
rows.name: So if you have those on hand, I'll happily take 'em.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0032
rows.name: I know it's not an easy amount to procure...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0033
rows.name:
But I also have faith that you can find it.
In fact, I KNOW you can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0034
rows.name:
I see you need a bit more time to gather the
arc sand ore. That's absolutely fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0035
rows.name:
Once I secure the arc sand ore, I can finally get started
on my exploratory study.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0036
rows.name:
Just one more hurdle to jump. But I'll be working on
further analyzing that data in the meantime.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0037
rows.name:
Perfect! Looks like you've gathered all the arc sand ore,
too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0038
rows.name:
You never cease to amaze.
But meanwhile, I'm stuck in my analysis here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0039
rows.name:
So this is a strange question, but have you had any
dealings with Tobias?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0070
rows.name: Smile

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that Tobias isn't so bad.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0080
rows.name: Scowl

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0081
rows.name: Say you can't stand Tobias.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0040
rows.name:
You think? Huh. I always thought he was a greedy jerk
intent on using FrontierNav for his own selfish profit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0041
rows.name:
Believe me, I agree. He's a selfish jerk who only sees
FrontierNav as a tool to sate his own greed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0042
rows.name:
But as I've been digging through these data units,
I've realized that there's still one more out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0043
rows.name:
And no matter what I try when tracking it down,
all roads seem to point to Tobias.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0044
rows.name:
If I had that sixth archive, it would fill in some big gaps
in the team's design.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0045
rows.name:
If you've got a rapport with Tobias, maybe you could
find some way to trade for it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0046
rows.name:
He absolutely hates me, otherwise I'd go myself.
Also, I doubt I could negotiate without punching him
right in his smug face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0047
rows.name:
Sorry to foist an unpleasant job on you, but I've got no
one else to turn to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0048
rows.name: It seems Tobias has the sixth data unit, FN098.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0049
rows.name:
I have no clue how he ended up with it or what he
hopes to gain, but I guess that doesn't matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0050
rows.name:
What DOES matter is that the legacy of my friends
doesn't end up in the hands of a weasel like him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0051
rows.name:
Well? How'd it go?
Did Tobias have the sixth data unit?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0052
rows.name:
...So the records were right.
And what did he say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0053
rows.name:
Knowing him, I'll bet he tried to extort you for
everything you're worth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0090
rows.name: Grimace

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0091
rows.name: Admit that Tobias demanded a huge sum of money.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0100
rows.name: Grin

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0101
rows.name: Tell Kirsty that Tobias decrypted the archive.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0054
rows.name: Typical. Sorry again to put you through that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0055
rows.name:
What does that fool plan to do with all that money,
anyway?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0056
rows.name:
What? That's not... But how? I was on the team,
and it took me FOREVER to crack their encryption.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0057
rows.name: How could he manage such a thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0058
rows.name: In any case, um...can I see it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0059
rows.name:
We don't have any more time to waste on Tobias.
I need to start researching this right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0060
rows.name: Hmm... Yes, it's just as I thought.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0061
rows.name:
This data unit is the final piece. It combines with
the other five you gathered to make one complete
blueprint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0062
rows.name:
There's still a long road ahead of us, but this is a big
boost in the right direction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0063
rows.name:
I'll get to work right away.
...Oh, and this is for you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0064
rows.name: A big boost in the right direction? Oh, please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0065
rows.name:
FrontierNav's system design is way out of your
wheelhouse, so spare me the amateurish optimism.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0066
rows.name:
You think designing an entire interstellar infrastructure
is some walk in the park? Just flip a few switches and
hope for the best? Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0067
rows.name:
T-Tobias? What are you doing here?
And how do you know about that?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0068
rows.name:
Nothing ever changes with you. You seem so together
on the surface, but some part of your brain's always
checked out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0069
rows.name: Ain't that right, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0111
rows.name: Admit that Tobias is correct.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0120
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0121
rows.name: Defend Kirsty and her judgment.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0070
rows.name:
Ha! Ya see? Most folks wouldn't understand, but this
cat here knows the score.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0071
rows.name:
Back on the Whale, me and the others were always
cleaning up Kirsty's messes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0072
rows.name:
Then the BLADEs must have beaten some sense into her,
because Kirsty was hopeless back on the Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0073
rows.name:
And every time she screwed up—which was a lot—me
and the rest of the gang had to clean it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0074
rows.name:
If you don't believe me, there's a personnel registry on
the data unit I gave you. Give a search for my name
and see what happens, yeah?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0075
rows.name: Is this a joke? Why would...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0076
rows.name: ...Oh my god.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0077
rows.name:
FrontierNav Network Development, Third Branch...
Why is your name on this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0078
rows.name:
Because I was working on the project, ya mope!
Don't you remember? We kept runnin' into each other
in the hallway![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0079
rows.name:
True, I had to have this handsome face swapped out
after the crash—that landing did a number on my nose.
But anyone can tell it's still me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0080
rows.name:
I don't care WHAT you used to look like!
I can't believe that a selfish, greedy man like yourself
was on that team in the first place.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0081
rows.name:
You need to quit judging and start thinking, sister!
You think expensive research projects get paid for with
sunshine and rainbows?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0082
rows.name:
And do you think BLADE HQ or the provisional
government would EVER pony up the cash for a
batcrap-crazy project like this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0083
rows.name:
M-maybe not now, but once we have a solid proposal
together, we can—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0084
rows.name:
Even proposals cost money! And right now, you don't
have enough to whip up a spreadsheet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0085
rows.name:
...So that's where I come in. I just transferred all the
money I've banked into your personal account.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0086
rows.name:
Don't go blowing it on dresses or something, yeah?
That's capital for the next generation of FrontierNav.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0087
rows.name:
Oh, and I'll handle the network development, so why
don't you stick to your specialty and whip up some
new data probes?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0088
rows.name: We good? ...Good, then I'm outta here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0089
rows.name:
Oh, and good work on collecting all those data units.
I'd actually been planning on handling that once I
finished gathering the money, buuut...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0090
rows.name:
But you saved me the trouble, ya bastard! And now I
promise that the last development-team survivors will
make their dream a reality.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0091
rows.name: ...What the hell just happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0130
rows.name: Cheer

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0131
rows.name: Congratulate Kirsty on her new partner.

rows.label: qev019401_JNK0140
rows.name: Warn

rows.label: qev019401_SEL0141
rows.name:
Caution Kirsty that Tobias is probably
using her for his own gain.

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0092
rows.name: P-partner? THAT walking avatar of avarice?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0093
rows.name:
But if he wants to rip me off, why did he put all his
money into funding this project?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0094
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev019401_MSG0095
rows.name:
Sorry, I... I think it's going to take some time for this to
all sink in.[ST:wait ]
